ComicInfo.Summary:
The entity that Nadia answers to is coming through to Earth from the Shadowlands. And even if the Black Knight can stop it, that might not be the true threat. Nadia gets what she craves, but she should be careful what she asks for. Peyton Parks pays a high price to learn what it takes to be a hero.
